website_summaries.verdict: The BlackBerry Z30 lives up the promise of a flagship phone, but it's too little, too late for all but the most committed BlackBerry users.
pros: The BlackBerry Z30 is equipped with a big screen, long battery life, and excellent messaging capabilities
It also boasts great call quality plus a microSD card slot for extra storage
cons: The Z30’s BlackBerry 10.2 software is bogged down with unnecessary eye candy
The BlackBerry platform still lags behind iOS and Android in both app number and quality
The Z30’s camera takes unimpressive pictures
The phone is only sold by Verizon

customer_reviews.title: Z30 for ATT
customer_reviews.text: I have been working with this phone for about 6 months now and its every bit as good as any other smartphone and in some ways better. I've loaded Waze, Uber, my bank,Trucaller, my alarm company, Concur even a printer using Amazon apps for android which the operating system for this phone accepts. So why is it better? Because I own the phone for $200+ bucks and I'm not paying for an "omg I gotta have an iphone" through some payment plan by my carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Neugent

customer_reviews.title: Software's a pain in the butt...
customer_reviews.text: Battery was DOA, had to exercise for approx. 2 months before it could be used. After that, it was fine...
customer_reviews.author: deltasweep

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The default apps are minimal at best. Very slow reaction time. Some browser pages will not open. To use workable apps equal to that of Android and iOS, you have to pay versus them being free on an Android or Apple phone.
customer_reviews.author: ICD

customer_reviews.title: Phone arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the phone arrived broken. The SIM card reader is what was broken. The rest of the phone was fine aside from a scratch on the bottom of the phone. I also wish the store had informed me ahead of time that only a return was an option for my situation. I only found that out after the return had been processed. I had asked ahead of time for an exchange, and they confirmed it would be an exchange. I went a couple of weeks without a phone, but the store did refund me all my money.
customer_reviews.author: swcrusade

customer_reviews.title: The best smartphone I've ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST SMARTPHONE EVERRRR! End of story (I've already written a review for the Z10... and if you read that, think EVEN BETTER! - the screen is bigger and I find better than the Z10, the battery life longer, plus a bunch of other things that just makes this even more perfect as a companion in your everyday life like the AM/FM radio app built in (yes, I'm still a bit old fashioned like that), and better real estate for when you're typing onscreen)
customer_reviews.author: Jericho C. Caalim

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one purchased here in two weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always been and will a be a BB fan. However, the last few weeks have been a bummer...This is the second one purchased here in two weeks, and for some reason, the SIM' card has not worked unable to connect the network, and they are unlocked. They stated model: STA100-5 BLK, but they were Model: STA100-3 even after they were upgraded. Hopefully they inspect these telephones before listing them.. The cards were difficult to pop out... I took both to telephones to the T-mobile store, and after several minutes trying to activate, no connection.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the negative reviews! I've had this for a few months now and its perfect. It functions better than any other smart phone. Sure the specs aren't as great as some of the latest phones out there but its still great. The battery life is better than any other smart phone. The camera isn't great in low light but its not bad. Besides that however, everything else is good about this phone. It looks great. It runs smooth. Its one of the most convenient devices you'll ever find. I would definitely recommend this phone.

customer_reviews.title: The best smartphone I have ever had.

customer_reviews.title: blackberry z30 sta 100-2
customer_reviews.text: I received the item on time. Been using the device for about a month now and I'm loving it. Battery lasts me all day and into the night with constant use. All around great phone. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a new device.

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary handset
customer_reviews.text: Recently received mine & there is no complaints so far. STA-100-2 works excellent down here in Latin America (Panama), phone is incredibly fast and responsive. Still uses my Z10 & Q10 but I must admit that the Z30 premium design is good to see and enjoy. The audio is outstanding. Good performance & quality on the multitasking. Transformer shell & Flip case fits perfecly. This is a must have for the enterprise person. This makes a great compliment to my Playbook as well. Good job Blackberry. This is the beginning of a great comeback with John Chen in charge of business,

What a waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone with all my heart. I previously used the Z10 and this was a welcomed upgrade from that. Both phone sizes are great however the Blackberry keyboard really gets to shine more on the Z30. It's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Device. Definitely  recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Got the STA100-2 version. Using it with Claro mobile provider in Costa Rica. Nice upgrade from Z10. Really fast. Non-replaceable battery but lasts much longer from that of the Z10 or any Iphone. Nice feel on my hand since it has rounded corner, unlike the Z10, always had to use both hands. Definitely would suggest to purchase this device. Using Snap you can download most Android apps. I have Instagram, Netflix, Vonage, IHeart Radio, Spotify, Amazon Music, Roku, Unblock US, Pandora and other Android apps running flawlessly on my device. Plus, there is nothing like Blackberry Hub. Emailing is so easy, organized and fast.

I'm sorry I'm unable o give specifics as I'm just learning myself. But if u google directions for z30 u can download complete step by step instructions. But from what I've seen so far, this phone outshines iphone and many flagship androids.

customer_reviews.title: Best full-touch BlackBerry yet!
customer_reviews.text: I've used BlackBerry's since the early days, and this is my first venture into all-touch. I really like the text-prediction and the ability to swipe words before I finish typing them. The hub is also a great feature for organizing all my Emails, texts and BBMs in one central location. It just lets me get things done.
